column5: Today I went out with a good buddy of mine fish-miester to do some fishing. We were originally going for pike and FM managed to catch 2 small pike, but still PB smallest for his self. The fishing for them was slow and I ended the day off with another solid 12" Perch. We caught about a half dozen smaller perch but aside from that we had a great day out there.  Enjoy Alex with the first of the day   And him again with the 2nd and the PB Smallest of the day lol   And then my Perch that I caught on a tip-up   Had a fun time fishing today, thanks for watching. Stay tuned for a report off of Simcoe for myself this weekend! MTBF   O and yes, I forgot to mention that Alex pulling the sled came into direct contact with a old frozen over hole and fell right through it lol. Thankfully I pulled him out right away to safety
Good time out there Mike lets do it again soon
How did you get back with that blizzard blowing in
Weather changes instantly my friend...unreal out there
lol too bad you didnt get a pic of me goin in .. or one of the many wide outs of the day..   or what about the pb soaker.. lol
Great job you guys Congrats to FM for his PB S Nice fat perch btw Mike Thanks for sharing Leechman
mike the hammer handle dominaTOR!  great job dude!   that percch is a BIG' UN!
Looks like you guys were fishing McLaurin Bay....    Wait until you hook into some of those Whities...   Nice going Mike....
I see the bait.. but where's the fish???  I figured y'all would be targeting LM Bass.  That ice looks unstable with all those waves in it dude!
Definitely a nice perch mike....another great report....now go get a proper pike.....lololol...again

haha we have been trying .. but apperently there are no such thing.. yet any ways !    and mike .. i dont recall u saving me at all .. hmm that must be because i was in and out of that water in seconds lol no help needed this time bud.. the cold shot me right out of the hole lol
